casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Lavelle JOHNSON, Petitioner No. 434 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 1, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 1st day of May, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED TO the issue set forth below. Allocatur is DENIED as to all remaining issues. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:

(1) Did the Superior Court err in ruling that the search warrant obtained to search [Petitioner's] cell phone was not unconstitutionally overbroad, under the Pennsylvania Constitution, by allowing an essentially unlimited search of the device for evidence of illegal narcotics and firearm possession?
